scripts.build: pnpm run release:new && wrangler deploy --dry-run --minify --outdir dist && pnpm run sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.release:new: sentry-cli releases new "ridi-apps-api@$(sentry-cli releases propose-version)" && sentry-cli releases set-commits "ridi-apps-api@$(sentry-cli releases propose-version)" --auto --ignore-missing
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org hood-software --project ridi-apps-api ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org hood-software --project ridi-apps-api ./dist
